attributes.action: make BskyB let the customer decide which channels he wants instead of paying for channels he doesnt
attributes.additional_details: Force virgin and sky tv to only sell you the channels you want instead of making you buy bundles of channels you dont ever watch, no other business is allowed to rip off its customers in this way, and its about time the goverment dept which oversea this to act on behalf of the public. say no to rip off bundles and yes to choice
